               java.util.ArrayList<ChartSet> data)

        Overrides:
        onDrawChart in class BaseBarChartView
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas to draw on
        data - ArrayList of ChartSet to use

      • onPreDrawChart

        protected void onPreDrawChart(java.util.ArrayList<ChartSet> data)
        (Optional) To be overriden in case the view needs to execute some code before starting the drawing.
        Parameters:
        data - Array of ChartSet to do the necessary preparation just before onDraw

      • defineRegions

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<android.graphics.Region>> defineRegions(java.util.ArrayList<ChartSet> data)
        (Optional) To be overridden in order for each chart to define its own clickable regions. This way, classes extending ChartView will only define their clickable regions. Important: the returned vector must match the order of the data passed by the user. This ensures that onTouchEvent will return the correct index.
        Parameters:
        data - ArrayList of ChartSet to use while defining each region of a BarChartView
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Region with regions where click will be detected
